para.text: To continue work on a saved project, you open the existing project file. If the project includes units, all the related units will also be loaded with the project.
To open a project, do the following.

li.text: dialog box, navigate to folder containing the project file.
Select the project file and click

para.text: You can also open your project when you start
starts, the New Project By Approach dialog box appears.
To open a project file from a folder, do the following.
